bioghist.p: Elwert and Weniger, formerly C.F. Elwert & Co., was a legal firm in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania.

scopecontent.p: Four of the volumes in this collection (1858-1865, 1871-1873, 1873-1875, 1877-1878) document powers of attorney made to German firms, chiefly Stahl and Federer of Stuttgart, to collect land rents, complete business transactions, and collect and forward legacies. The clients involved are principally from Pennsylvania's German-speaking community. The collection also includes one volume of cash disbursals, 1867-1871, for firms in New York and Stuttgart. The entries are in German.

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research.

acqinfo.p: Provenance: Gift of the Moyerman family.
